title: 3D Spheres Algorithm
shortDescription: I have implemented an algorithm for drawing 3D spheres using geometry, trigonometry and mathematics in Java.
longDescription: You can change the radius, color, number of spheres and move them in XYZ plane. Every pixel of sphere is calculated using alorithm. This was my university project.
challenges: Figuring out the correct algorithms to draw 3D elements on XYZ plane.
